posts.post_title: WTB: Ty cobb Red, bat off
posts.post_content:
please email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] or PM me. Would be willing to trade too. Would prefer a grade in the 2-4 range but would certainly look at anything.

Pete

I have a very nice raw red portrait that I'm planning to have graded, but I'm afraid it will only grade "authentic" due to trimming. In other words, it's sharp, but trimmed. Interested?
--Rob
